title: Migrate oauth.do/react to use @mdxui/auth
description:
Replace direct WorkOS AuthKit wrappers with @mdxui/auth package.

## Background
- oauth.do currently wraps @workos-inc/authkit-react directly in src/react.tsx
- @mdxui/auth now provides unified auth components used across mdxui
- Should consume @mdxui/auth instead of duplicating wrappers

## Current implementation (to replace)
src/react.tsx imports from:
- @workos-inc/widgets (ApiKeys, UsersManagement, UserProfile)
- @workos-inc/authkit-react (AuthKitProvider, useAuth)

Exports own wrappers:
- OAuthDoProvider
- useAuth, useOAuthDoConfig
- SignInButton, SignOutButton
- ApiKeys, UsersManagement, UserProfile

## New implementation
Replace with re-exports from @mdxui/auth:
- IdentityProvider (or wrap with oauth.do config)
- useAuth (re-export)
- SignInButton, SignOutButton (re-export)
- Widget components (re-export)

## Benefits
- Consistent with mdxui ecosystem
- Less maintenance burden
- Access to new auth components (UserMenu, TeamSwitcher, etc.)
- Vault components will be available via same package
